• Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org version 2.73

    75940-7Potassium [Mass/​volume] in Blood

    41656-0Potassium [Moles/​volume] in Mixed venous blood

    6298-4Potassium [Moles/​volume] in Blood

name: Valueset_potassium_LOINC
title: LOINC Codes for Serum Potassium
description: ValueSet containing serum potassium LOINC identifiers from the HEDIS Serum Potassium Value Set.
